paper_abstract: Bialgebras and distributive laws are an abstract, categorical framework to study various flavors of structural operational semantics. This paper aims to introduce the reader to the basics of bialgebras for operational semantics, and to sketch the state of the art in this research area. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: Bialgebras for structural operational semantics: An introduction
